I would appreciate your support in granting a special approval to use the credit balances with Nasco Gulf for these portfolios to perform an offset. This will help us efficiently resolve the remaining outstanding amounts.

 

Additionally, I suggest we schedule a clarification call to align on this process. It’s important for me to ensure that the HR portfolio remains separate from mine, and I would greatly appreciate your assistance in securing a special approval to use Nasco Gulf’s credit balance to close the outstanding amounts with GIG. This will clear the balance for all parties involved.

 

Please let me know if you would like to schedule a call, or if any further clarification is required.

 

Thank you in advance for your kind support.

 

Best regards,

Hagop
